title: Table 157 - Row 4
clause_text: Occupancy (2): iv) For Hotels | Parking Space required (3): One parking space for every 100 sq. m of total floor area of a lodging establishment b) For hotels and eating houses, one parking space for every -25sq.m of restaurant including hall, dining room, pantry & bar
